channel.title: RuneScape economy
channel.description: I rarely play RuneScape but I'm wondering what's wrong with its economy? So much buzz going on.

item.title: RuneScape economy
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

Davidi2:

I wanted to buy a fury when it was 1-3m, but I was poor then

Lol, I remember making 500k a night merchanting. I merchanted bolt rocks. I bought for 160-180, and sold for like 250 each. But that was only on occasions when I got access to world 2.
But somehow most of my cash, but I can’t remember how.

Also: Might I add to this topic, that double exp weekend didn’t really effect the economy, as much as the first. A few things will/won’t sell such as arrows, sharks, and glories. All won’t sell/buy.

Read full topic

item.description:

I wanted to buy a fury when it was 1-3m, but I was poor then

item.title: RuneScape economy
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

[quote=“abatssk8ter, post:40, topic:356113”]Only thing that has gone up dramatically is rares? which makes sense because they are intact discontinued items

ags is 70-75M like it was in 07
whip is around 3M like it was in 07
fury is somewhere around 10m like it was

its all going back to the way it was[/quote]

You must have not played.

Whips were 3.5-4m (maybe 5)

Furies were 1.5m-3m

AGS was not 70m, when a new item is released, the prices are outrageous. So most likely it was around 100m.

Full dh I believe were 7m.
Full verac was 5m.
Full Guthans was the most expensive at 11-14m.
Full Karils 3m.
Full Torags, 1.5-2m
Full Ahrims, no idea.

Read full topic

item.title: RuneScape economy
item.dc:creator: @Errorist Errorist
item.description:
@Errorist wrote:

I barely know what any of these items are, last time I logged in RS2 was 2005.

Read full topic

item.title: RuneScape economy
item.dc:creator: @Rixxx Rix_
item.description:
@Rixxx wrote:

Climbing boots from 12gp to 75K gp?!

Read full topic

item.title: RuneScape economy
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

[quote=“abatssk8ter, post:40, topic:356113”]Only thing that has gone up dramatically is rares? which makes sense because they are intact discontinued items

ags is 70-75M like it was in 07
whip is around 3M like it was in 07
fury is somewhere around 10m like it was

its all going back to the way it was[/quote]

iirc ags was 130-140mil for the longest time, maybe that was 08 though

fury was 3-4mil

whip was about the same, 2-3mil

dfs was ~25mil or so (when I bought one in sep 07)

ranger boots have shot up in price

barrows prices are way different now (dharoks, ahrims, karils worth a lot more), guthans spear is basically worth nothing compared to what it once was

those are just a few I can remember

Read full topic

item.title: RuneScape economy
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

[quote=“abatssk8ter, post:40, topic:356113”]Only thing that has gone up dramatically is rares? which makes sense because they are intact discontinued items

ags is 70-75M like it was in 07
whip is around 3M like it was in 07
fury is somewhere around 10m like it was

its all going back to the way it was[/quote]

Ags is fine.
Whip is currently sticking around the 3.5m-4m region; it’s not getting any lower at the moment. In '07 it was around 2.5-3m.
Fury was nowhere near 10m in '07, it was almost always around 3m.

Read full topic

item.title: RuneScape economy
item.dc:creator: @abatssk8ter abatssk8ter
item.description:
@abatssk8ter wrote:

[quote=“Rich, post:35, topic:356113”][quote author=abatssk8ter link=topic=452652.msg3330621#msg3330621 date=1283447612]

The economy of rs sucks. Climbing boots awere 75k cmon isnt normal.
Fury , berserker ring all fucked up
A full set of dharok was 5mill now the helm of it is already 6mill Rs = gone die
(I quited)

You must of JUST started playing then, the prices are returning to what they use to be in 06-07 when we had the best eco imo.
[/quote]

uh, what? a lot of the top items are nowhere near the price they were in 06-07

going by ge price anyway, I don’t keep up with street prices (and even then, they’re probably worth more)[/quote]
Only thing that has gone up dramatically is rares? which makes sense because they are intact discontinued items

ags is 70-75M like it was in 07
whip is around 3M like it was in 07
fury is somewhere around 10m like it was

its all going back to the way it was

Read full topic

item.title: RuneScape economy
item.dc:creator: @Miles1 Miles`
item.description:
@Miles1 wrote:

Atleast RS2 has a fixed price range, sure it changes daily or weekly or w\e it is. But compared to Classic you could be selling blue party hats one day for 200M, and the next day 700M depending on who cleaned who the other night staking lol

[quote=“the elve age, post:32, topic:356113”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=452652.msg3329941#msg3329941 date=1283390197]

[quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=452652.msg3329827#msg3329827 date=1283386021]Correcting grammar is not being a dick, it’s making it easier for others to understand.

It’s quote obvious what he said, there is no need for grammar correction; we’re talking to each other on a generally informal online forum, not in real life. People only correct others’ grammar to make themselves look better, to be honest.
[/quote]I was talking in general, not to that specific post.
[/quote]

Sorry, I was also talking about that specific post :/[/quote]So? I was replying to all people that complain about people that fix grammar…

item.description:

[quote author=Chassy13 link=topic=452652.msg3321659#msg3321659 date=1282761058]

upcoming double xp weekend leaves supplies bought out.
[/quote]I know right? And even on the forums people are flaming jagex for doing this.

So they can lower prices, taking money out.

Not sure if you are supporting the weekend here but I disagree with Bonus XP Weekends and I think it’s ridiculous they encourage people to buy out the Grand Exchange.

[/quote]Fail quote

But you realize people will be fishing and WC’ing too… not much will change.[/quote]

Lag = fail quote

Fish prices will never be fixed.
